body_html: Seconding bwesons's comment. I have CUDA 8.0 and Tensorflow 1.3. I followed the current install instructions for TF 1.5 (GPU, ubuntu, virtualenv) and it breaks as described above. Reverting to TF 1.3 until this is resolved.

body: Seconding bwesons's comment. I have CUDA 8.0 and Tensorflow 1.3. I followed the current install instructions for TF 1.5 (GPU, ubuntu, virtualenv) and it breaks as described above. Reverting to TF 1.3 until this is resolved.
